sentences.en: An interferometer invented by Michelson was used by Michelson and Morely.
sentences.cn: 迈克耳孙和莫雷使用一台迈克耳孙发明的干涉仪.

sentences.en: Appling Michelson interferometer knowledge in physics, its application of precise size measure is introduced.
sentences.cn: 应用物理学中的迈克耳孙干涉仪知识, 介绍其在精密尺寸测量中的运用.

sentences.en: Based on Michelson interferometer, the laser Doppler effect experiment instrument is designed.
sentences.cn: 通过对迈克耳孙干涉仪动镜的改装和机械加工, 设计了激光多普勒效应实验装置.

sentences.en: Comparatively rudimentary interferometer observations suggested that this source is about 1.5 across.
sentences.cn: 不很精确的射电干涉仪观测表明,这个源的角径约为1.5弧秒.

sentences.en: Currently under construction in Fermilab, the Holometer (meaning holographic interferometer) will delve deep into this quantum realm at smaller scales than the GEO600 experiment.
sentences.cn: 目前在费米实验室制造的“全息干涉仪”，将比GEO600探测到更小的尺度，进入到量子尺度。

sentences.en: Digital image holographic interferometer is used to measure the mass diffusion coefficient of fluid.
sentences.cn: 确定了使用数字全息激光干涉法测量流体质扩散系数.

sentences.en: Interferometer: Optic compensation RockSolidTM, proprietary vibration interferometer , permanently aligned.
sentences.cn: 干涉仪: 专利产品,光学补偿,永远准直, 抗振动.

sentences.en: Michelson interferometer has a simple structure, and is applied earliest.
sentences.cn: Michelson干涉仪结构简单, 最早被用来检测压电薄膜厚度的变化.

sentences.en: One possibility, according to Hogan, would be to use a device called an atom interferometer.
sentences.cn: 霍根说，一种可行方式是使用所谓的“原子干涉仪”设备。

sentences.en: Operational trace gas retrieval algorithm for the Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer.
sentences.cn: 红外线大气探测干涉仪的业务示踪气体的反演算法.

sentences.en: Resonant mass detectors are less expensive to build than laser interferometer detectors.
sentences.cn: 建造共振质量探测仪不像建造激光干涉计探测仪那么昂贵.

sentences.en: The circular fringe of wavefront - splitting interference can be produced by an improved Mach - Zehnder interferometer.
sentences.cn: 对马赫 — 曾德干涉仪作适当改进后,可以产生出分波前干涉的全圆形干涉条纹.

sentences.en: The interferometer is relatively difficult to align.
sentences.cn: 这种干涉仪比较难调整.

sentences.en: The light is resolved by prisms, gratings, or by an interferometer.
sentences.cn: 光线用棱镜 、 光栅或干涉仪分解.

sentences.en: The principle of the system of interferometer in large aperture image spectrometer has been expatiated.
sentences.cn: 提出了大孔径干涉型成像光谱仪的原理,并展示了攻关样机和实验数据.

sentences.en: This is achieved by firing a laser down a 600 meter long tube where it is split, reflected and directed into an interferometer.
sentences.cn: 实现这一功能，需要发射一束激光，穿过600米的隧道后，将激光分裂成两束，经过反射的一束和未反射的一束均进入干涉仪。

sentences.en: We cannot, of course, stop the world but we can rotate the interferometer.
sentences.cn: 我们当然不能使地球停止运动,但是我们可旋转干涉仪.

sentences.en: We present a method to measure the evanescent field by Michelson interferometer.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种用迈克尔逊干涉仪探测隐失场的方法.

trans.tran_en: any acoustic, optical, or microwave instrument that uses interference patterns or fringes to make accurate measurements of wavelength, wave velocity, distance, etc
